Key.Original: Healing has been started. Don't move!
Key.English: Healing has been started. Don't move!
Key.Polish: Leczenie zostało rozpoczęte. Nie ruszaj się!

Key.Original: Healing has been started. Don't exit the vehicle!
Key.English: Healing has been started. Don't exit the vehicle!
Key.Polish: Leczenie zostało rozpoczęte. Nie opuszczaj pojazdu!

Key.Original: Healing has been stopped. You're too far
Key.English: Healing has been stopped. You're too far
Key.Polish: Leczenie zostało zatrzymane. Jesteś zbyt daleko

Key.Original: Healing has been stopped. You exited vehicle
Key.English: Healing has been stopped. You exited vehicle

Key.Original: has been added to object cargo
Key.English: has been added to object cargo

Key.Original: How many time AI is going to need to heal wounds. It's (number of wounds + blood pressure difference) * modifier. If unit is unconscious then adding 5 * modifier to healing time.
Key.English: How many time AI is going to need to heal wounds. It's (number of wounds + blood pressure difference) * modifier. If unit is unconscious then adding 5 * modifier to healing time.
Key.Polish: Jak dużo czasu SI będzie potrzebowało na wyleczenie ran. Jest to (ilość ran + różnica ciśnienia) * modyfikator. Jeżeli jednostka jest nieprzytomna dodaje 5 * modyfikator do czasu leczenia.

Key.Original: Should AI leave medical rubbish after healing?
Key.English: Should AI leave medical rubbish after healing?
Key.Polish: Czy SI powinno zostawiać śmieci po leczeniu?

Key.Original: How long AI should be healing to leave one rubbish on ground?
Key.English: How long AI should be healing to leave one rubbish on ground?
Key.Polish: Jak długo SI powinno leczyć aby zostawić jedne śmieci na ziemi?
